8 tf::Vector3 LissajousPlanner::get_position(ros::Duration time)
9 {
10  double t;
11  t=time.toSec();
12  tf::Vector3 r(0,0,0);
13  double x;
14  x=this->plan.Ax*sin(this->plan.omegax*t);
15  double y;
16  y=this->plan.Ay*sin(this->plan.omegax*this->plan.ratio*t+this->plan.dphi);
17 
18  return tf::Vector3(x,y,0);
19 }
20 
21 tf::Vector3 LissajousPlanner::get_velocity(ros::Duration time)
22 {
23  double t=time.toSec();
24  double dx=this->plan.Ax*cos(this->plan.omegax*t)*this->plan.omegax;
25  double dy=this->plan.Ay*cos(this->plan.omegax*this->plan.ratio*t+this->plan.dphi)*this->plan.omegax*this->plan.ratio;
26  tf::Vector3 vel(dx,
27  dy,
28  0);
29  return vel;
30 }
31 
32  tf::Vector3 LissajousPlanner::get_acceleration(ros::Duration time)
33  {
34 
35  double t=time.toSec();
36  double dx=-this->plan.Ax*sin(this->plan.omegax*t)*std::pow(this->plan.omegax,2.0);
37  double dy=-this->plan.Ay*sin(this->plan.omegax*this->plan.ratio*t+this->plan.dphi)*std::pow(this->plan.omegax*this->plan.ratio,2.0);
38  tf::Vector3 acc(dx,
39  dy,
40  0);
41  return acc;
42  }
43 
44 tf::Quaternion LissajousPlanner::get_orientation(ros::Duration time)
45 {
46  double t=time.toSec();
47  tf::Vector3 tangent;
48  tangent.setX(this->plan.Ax*cos(this->plan.omegax*t)*this->plan.omegax);
49  tangent.setY(this->plan.Ay*cos(this->plan.omegax*this->plan.ratio*t+this->plan.dphi)*this->plan.omegax*this->plan.ratio);
50  return tf::createQuaternionFromYaw(atan2(tangent.y(),tangent.x()));
51 
52 }
53 
54 double LissajousPlanner::get_angular_velocity(ros::Duration time)
55 {
56  tf::Vector3 acc(this->get_acceleration(time));
57  tf::Vector3 vel(this->get_velocity(time));
58  return (vel.x()*acc.y()-vel.y()*acc.x())/vel.length2();
59 }

62 void LissajousPlanner::set_parameter(float omegax,float dphi,int ratio,float Ax,float Ay)
63 {
64  this->plan.Ax=Ax;
65  this->plan.Ay=Ay;
66  this->plan.omegax=omegax;
67  this->plan.dphi=dphi;
68  this->plan.ratio=ratio;
69 }
70 
71 void LissajousPlanner::loadChild()
72 {
73  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
74  priv.getParam(PARAM_ITERATION,this->iterations);
75  priv.getParam(PARAM_AMP_X,this->plan.Ax);
76  priv.getParam(PARAM_AMP_Y,this->plan.Ay);
77  priv.getParam(PARAM_RATIO,this->plan.ratio);
78  priv.getParam(PARAM_PHASE,this->plan.dphi);
79  priv.getParam(PARAM_OMEGA,this->plan.omegax);
80  ROS_INFO("Loaded %s : AmplifierX %lf AmplifierY %lf Ratio %i PhaseShift %lf Omega: %lf ",
81  ros::this_node::getName().c_str(),
82  this->plan.Ax,
83  this->plan.Ay,
84  this->plan.ratio,
85  this->plan.dphi,
86  this->plan.omegax);
87 }
88 
89 void LissajousPlanner::check_period(ros::Duration time)
90 {
91  if(this->plan.omegax*time.toSec()>(this->iterations_counter+1)*2*M_PI)
92  {
93  this->iterations_counter++;
94  }
95 }
